Package de.bcservices.bsynced.api

Class BSyncedMessageAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bcservices.bsynced.api.BSyncedMessageAPI
  • public class BSyncedMessageAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    BSyncedMessageAPI represents the API resource for GDSN Messages. Note: it is necessary to close the CloseableHttpResponse manually. Example usage: 
     

     BSyncedAPIContext apiContext = new BSyncedAPIContext(API_TOKEN);

     BSyncedMessageAPI messageApi = new BSyncedMessageAPI(apiContext);

     CloseableHttpResponse response = messageApi.postGdsnMessage(GDSN_MESSAGE_XML);

     assert response.getStatusLine().getStatusCode() == 201;

     response.close();

      • getMessageByID

        public org.apache.http.client.methods.CloseableHttpResponse getMessageByID​(java.lang.String messageID)
                                                                    throws BSyncedException
        This method is used to retrieve a message with the given message ID.
        Parameters:
        messageID - ID of the message to be retrieved
        Returns:
        the HTTP response which contains the XML message in the body
        Throws:
        BSyncedException - Any exceptions encountered

      • getMessageCollection

        public org.apache.http.client.methods.CloseableHttpResponse getMessageCollection​(java.lang.String direction,
                                                                                 java.lang.String messageType,
                                                                                 int page,
                                                                                 int perPage,
                                                                                 java.lang.String from,
                                                                                 java.lang.String to,
                                                                                 java.lang.String order,
                                                                                 java.lang.String orderBy,
                                                                                 java.lang.String query)
                                                                          throws BSyncedException
        This method is used to retrieve message collection with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        direction - Either "inbound" or "outbound"
        messageType - One of the GDSN messages type
        page - Page number
        perPage - Limit of entries per page
        from - The timestamp from which the messages are included
        to - The timestamp to which the messages are included
        order - Either "sender", "receiver" or "submitted_at"
        orderBy - Either "ASC" or "DESC"
        query - The text to be searched within the XML messages
        Returns:
        the HTTP response from GET message collection request
        Throws:
        BSyncedException - Any exceptions encountered

      • getMessageCount

        public org.apache.http.client.methods.CloseableHttpResponse getMessageCount​(java.lang.String direction,
                                                                            java.lang.String from,
                                                                            java.lang.String to)
                                                                     throws BSyncedException
        This method is used to retrieve the messages count. Retrieve the count of inbound/outbound messages for the company of the current user. If both fromTimestamp and toTimestamp are not included, the total inbound/outbound message count is returned
        Parameters:
        direction - Either "inbound" or "outbound"
        from - The timestamp from which the messages are included
        to - The timestamp to which the messages are included
        Returns:
        the HTTP response from the GET request
        Throws:
        BSyncedException - Any exceptions encountered

        This method is used to retrieve the current processing status of a specific message, given a message ID.
        Parameters:
        msgId - - ID of the message which the processing status is requested
        Returns:
        the HTTP response from the GET request
        Throws:
        BSyncedException - Any exceptions encountered
